dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for Chinese text normalization, which includes a well-designed classification standard for non-standard words (NSWs) with 29 categories, extracted from Chinese Wikipedia, consisting of 30,000 sentences with an average length of 50 characters.
dcterms:title: Chinese Text Normalization Dataset
